item.title: C packages

item.title: mach-gpu: the WebGPU interface for Zig
item.description: The WebGPU interface for Zig As with all Mach libraries, zero-fuss installation, cross-compilation at the flip of a switch, and broad platform support is guaranteed. Quick links: mach-gpu on GitHub Perfecting WebGPU/Dawn native graphics for Zig (article) Perfecting The future of graphics with Zig (article) Goals Allow comptime-defined interception of WebGPU API requests (comptime interfaces.) Expose a standard Dawn webgpu.h-compliant C ABI, which routes through Zig comptime interfaces.
